page.title: 10THE GAMECOCK INN
page.content: THE GAMECOCK INN IS SITUATED JUST OFF THE MAIN ROAD.IN WINTER THE INN DOSENT HAVE MANY CUSTOMERS(ABOUT 50 A WEEK),BUT IN THE SUMMER IT CAN HAVE UP TO 1000 CUSTOMERS A WEEK.THE GAMECOCK INN ADVERTISES IN THE LOCAL PRESS AND IN THE VILLAGE.EVERY OTHER WEEK THERE IS ENTERTAINMENT,INCLUDING ORGANISTS AND "SING_ALONGS".MOST PEOPLE COME TO THE INN SOLELY FOR THE PURPOSE OF DRINKING,BUT MORE AND MORE PEOPLE ARE BEGINNING TO EAT THERE.THE MAIN SOURCE OF INCOME IS THE ALE,BECAUSE IT IS TRADITIONAL ALE NOT PASTURISED ALE.THE HOURS FOR THE GAMECOCK INN ARE AS FOLLOWS:MORNING_10.00_2.30.EVENING:6.3 0_11.00.THE SUNDAY OPENING HOURS ARE THE SAME AS THEY ARE ALL OVER THE COUNTRY.
